content: super cute rainbow baby doll blanket the blanket minmics the rainbow ripple blanket which my granddaugthers are obsessed with finished size 15 5 inches point to point yarn big twist value 100% acrylic 1 skein each white sky blue pale pink pale yellow mint pale peach soft purple crochet hook 5 00 mm adjust hook size as needed stitch abbreviations chain chain small shell double_crochet ch2 double_crochet st/sts stitch/es large shell 2dc ch2 2dc slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet skip skip space - space important notes always crochet over your ends to lessen the work at finishing do not chain 3 at beginning of round it will be very visible this patern is absolutely free here and on my blog
